message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $95. I believe it offers excellent value at this price point, considering its worth to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. I'm looking to save as much as I can, and I'm not sure the product is worth $95 to me.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. How about we meet halfway at $90? This would still be a significant saving compared to its actual value to you.
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant. How about we meet at $87.50? I'm willing to meet you halfway between $85 and $90, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
